title: 'It's insightful, it's informative.' Neil deGrasse Tyson on his 5-hour backyard audio chat with William Shatner (interview)
description: 'He's wise and very well educated and so every turn of conversation is rich.'
content: 'He's wise and very well educated and so every turn of conversation is rich.'
